name: Open Target Shooter VR
description:
Virtual Reality (VR) conversion of the Open Source Target Shooter made by TheLastFlapjack in Godot, found here: Open Target Shooter by thelastflapjack (itch.io).  An old-fashioned, fun, quick-paced, arcade-style moving target shooter.  Choose from two weapons and try to get the best time you can in each of the five included levels.  Since this is open sourced and made with Godot, try to make and add some of your own levels or submit a pull request with a level!

Powered by Godot OpenXR, so there are SteamVR / PCVR and Quest APK builds. Should work with all headsets.

Controls included in "Controls" menu in the main menu.

In settings, use "VR Left Handed" to turn on left handed mode (primary gun hand changed to left hand and weapon HUD moved to left hand), or VR Snap Turn to turn snap turning on.  Teleporting can be done with your non-gun hand A button.

Use your radial menus, brought up by the Y / B buttons to choose weapons (weapon hand) and levels (non-weapon hand) by hovering over the icon and releasing the button.

See credits for credits.

See my github fork of thelastflapjack's repo for the VR Source code: teddybear082/godot_open_target_shooter: An open source third person shoot time trial game made with Godot 3.5 (github.com)

To play, just unzip the windows file and run the exe for PCVR or for Quest, install the APK to your Quest, for instance by using the Sidequest install APK command.
